import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import Breadcrumb from '../common/breadcrumb'; import { UncontrolledTooltip } from 'reactstrap'; const TooltipsComponent = () => { return (
Basic Tooltip
Hello world!
Directions
Hello world! Hello world! Hello world! Hello world!
HTML elements
Tooltip with HTML Tooltip with HTML Tooltip with HTML Tooltip with HTML
Offset
Tooltip title Tooltip title Tooltip title
); }; export default TooltipsComponent;
